mutants.code:
from typing import List, Tuple

def calculate_polygon_area(vertices: List[Tuple[float, float]]) -> float:
    if len(vertices) <= 3:
        return 0
    n = len(vertices)
    area = 0
    for i in range(n):
        j = (i + 1) % n
        area += vertices[i][0] * vertices[j][1]
        area -= vertices[i][1] * vertices[j][0]
    area = abs(area) / 2
    return area
